projects.title: Upwork-Freelancer
projects.description: Upwork-Freelancer , I started to take on freelance projects to gain experience and build my portfolio, I have worked on a variety of projects, including web development, mobile app development, and software development, as you can see my skills are diverse and I am always looking to learn and grow. My many positive reviews and feedback from my clients are a testament to my dedication and commitment to delivering high-quality work.

projects.title: Flight Tracker
projects.description: Flight Tracker is a web application that allows users to track flights and view details about each flight. The app was built using HTML CSS and a call for API.

projects.title: Angular FastAPI  Python
projects.description: One of many app I was previledge to work on. I was responsible for developing a course explorer app that allows users to search for courses and view details about each course. The app was built using FastAPI for the backend and Angular for the frontend.
